name: Nighttime Bread Delivery Service
description:
It's a hot summer night by the oceanside, and all the animals are too tired to get food themselves. Play as a raccoon running a bread delivery service in this very short platformer game. 

[Made for the UW Tri-Campus Game Jam 2021]

Credits:

Art and programming: Raiku Fu  

Music: Dan Bodan - Anton https://www.youtube.com/c/danbodan 

Ocean SFX: https://www.zapsplat.com/ 

Additional SFX: remaxim (licensed CC-BY-SA 3.0 https://opengameart.org/users/remaxim)
